import '../../App.css' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import useHome from '../Hooks/useHome' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import axios from 'axios' export default ()=>{ const storedata = useSelector(abc=>abc.datareducer.textData) || [] const [editCheck, setEditCheck] = useState(false) const [addData, setAdd] = useState('') const [editData, setEdit] = useState('') const {addform, editform, editrow, delrow} = useHome(addData, editData, setEditCheck, storedata, setEdit) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('/get-todo') }) return <>

TODO-LIST with Mern/Redux

{ editCheck ?

Update DATA

setEdit(e.target.value)} value={editData}/>
:

ADD DATA

setAdd(e.target.value)} value={addData}/>
}

HISTORY

    { storedata.map((ab, indx)=>{ return
  • {ab}
    • }) }
}
